name: Moe Slot Beach no Shizuku
summary:
Put out the enchanted "777" with your fingers! The beach fairies produce a full-fledged casino-style slot game with bonus elements such as "JACK POT" and "FACTOR" in a refreshing and lovely way! "Shizuku" and "Haruna" of "Beach Volleyball Girl Shizuku" will be very active here and there in the game, such as navigating and directing a jackpot.

In the game, it is equipped with a "tutorial" that explains the rules in an easy-to-understand manner, and a "autoplay" function that automatically bets coins and keeps turning the reels. In addition, if you meet certain conditions, the number of "Haruna" costumes will increase, and you can enjoy dressing up.

There is no doubt that you will be addicted to the complete costume added to the game that can be easily played with simple operation!!
